comment: Alternate definition of the unique existential quantifier ~ df-eu not using the at-most-one quantifier. (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1993.) This used to be the definition of the unique existential quantifier, while ~ df-eu was then proved as ~ dfeu . (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2022.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-Jan-2023.)
